channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Calendar

item.title: CVE-2022-22682|2024-09-17T00:20:46.045Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Event Management in Synology Calendar before 2.4.5-10930 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-34812|2024-09-17T01:31:29.491Z -- synology -- synology%20calendar
item.description: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability in php component in Synology Calendar before 2.4.0-0761 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.
